article_title: Good Riddance To Bill Eliminating Medical Debt From Credit Scores

article_metadata.description: English: Barack Obama signing the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act at the White House (Photo credit: Wikipedia) There are persuasive indications that the Medical Debt Responsibility Act is dead -- again. Our advice to  Sen. Jeff Merkley (D-Ore.), who filed the bill  in the Senate in February, and Rep. Maxine Waters (D-Calif.) who filed a companion bill in the House: Let it stay dead. The [...]
